public class TaskScheduler.SchedulerTaskParam<T> extends TaskScheduler.SchedulerTask
Represents a SchedulerTask with a parameter.

  • Constructor Details

    • SchedulerTaskParam

      protected SchedulerTaskParam(TaskScheduler ts, double seconds, Consumer<T> x, T data)
      Constructs a SchedulerTaskParam with the specified delay, consumer function, and parameter.
      Parameters:
      ts - The TaskScheduler instance.
      seconds - The delay in seconds before executing the task.
      x - The consumer function to execute.
      data - The parameter to pass to the consumer function.
